0.title: Pilot
0.plot: Sisters, Yukia and Yuneisia specialize in curvier brides; from Christen, who lost her father when she was six, to Zoe, a plus-size store owner, to Gabby, who ordered her dress a size too small, these sisters unite brides with the gowns of their dreams.

1.title: Wedding Picture Perfect
1.plot: Personal experience inspired Yukia and Yuneisia to open Curvaceous Couture so they could give curvy brides the chance to find a dream wedding dress. Yukia gets a wedding photo re-do in a dress that makes her feel like the bride she always wanted to be.

2.title: Taking It to the Catwalk
2.plot: The sisters plan a bridal fashion show at the salon and get some help from a very special customer: America's Next Top Model winner Whitney Thompson! Yukia is determined to find bride Stephanie a dress she feels gorgeous in after losing 140 pounds.

3.title: Mom Knows Best
3.plot: Yukia and Yuneisia's mother, Diana, decides she would be a great dress consultant and tries to hijack one of their appointments! Meanwhile, it's a challenge helping two brides find their dream dresses when their opinionated moms get in the way.

4.title: Mark Downs and High Stakes
4.plot: The sisters host a sample sale with bargain prices to make room for new inventory. It's total chaos on the big day, but sheer bliss for the brides who find their dream gowns at dream costs. And one very lucky bride could win a free wedding dress!

5.title: Bridal Market Bling
5.plot: It's Yukia's favorite time of the season: shopping for gowns at the New York Bridal Market! She's ready to buy, buy, buy, but Yuneisia needs to keep her in check! Before heading to NYC, two brides inspire the sisters to seek out unique dress styles.

6.title: Brides That Inspire and a Project Prom Flyer
6.plot: Two brides who have selflessly made sacrifices to help others inspire Yukia and Yuneisia to take action. So, they get involved with Say Yes to the Prom by collecting dress donations to help young, deserving girls find the prom dress of their dreams!

7.title: Weighing All the Options
7.plot: Every day Yukia & Yuneisia see brides dealing with health issues or medications that drastically change their body shape and wreak havoc on their self-esteem. Yukia's own health issues become reality, but the family's support help her make a change.

8.title: A Diva and an Opera Singer Walk Into a Bridal Shop
8.plot: Yukia is convinced that she has a fabulous singing voice, so when an opera diva and gospel singer come to the salon, Yukia can't help but show off her chops! But everyone is left speechless when store manager, Shannon stuns at a surprise recital.

9.title: Anything Goes!
9.plot: Yukia and Yuneisia are proud to customize each gown to perfectly suit the bride's shape and personality. Their very talented seamstress, Amy, has her hands full working on a whimsical customization, plus a very special request that surprises everyone!

10.title: Daddy's Girl
10.plot: Curvaceous Couture is a family business, so Yuneisia and Yukia's dad is their go-to for everything- particularly handy work at the store. Hearing heart-felt stories from dads and brides, the sisters are inspired to lavish a little extra love on their dad.

11.title: Don't Judge a Book by Its Cover
11.plot: Yukia & Yuneisia worry the salon's unappealing exterior gives potential customers the wrong impression about what's inside, so they consider making a big change. The sisters also do a bride makeover so both her outer and inner beauty shine brightly.

12.title: The Bonds of Sisterhood
12.plot: Although they may have a difference of opinions, Yukia & Yuneisia share an inseparable bond as sisters & friends. And they need a night out! But first it's all about sisterhood when a bride arrives with an abundance of love from 9 bridesmaids!

imdb.plot outline: "Curvy Brides" showcases the plus-size bridal salon Curvaceous Couture, located in Maryland. Owned and operated by sisters Yukia and Yuneisia, "Curvy Brides" demonstrates that there's a dream dress out there for every woman, no matter her size.
imdb.title: Curvy Brides
plot: "_Curvy Brides_ (qv)" showcases the plus-size bridal salon Curvaceous Couture, located in Maryland. Owned and operated by sisters Yukia and Yuneisia, "_Curvy Brides_ (qv)" demonstrates that there's a dream dress out there for every woman, no matter her size.::Half Yard
